Define class Object2Yaml with attribute(s) and method(s). Convert a configuration object to a yaml format and write to file.
class ats_utilities.config_io.yaml.object2yaml.Object2Yaml(configuration_file)[source]¶

Bases: ats_utilities.config_io.base_write.BaseWriteConfig

Define class Object2Yaml with attribute(s) and method(s). Convert a configuration object to a yaml format and write to file. It defines:

attributes:
__FORMAT - Format of configuration content.
methods:
__init__ - Initial constructor.
write_configuration - Write configuration to a yaml file
write_configuration(configuration)[source]¶

Write configuration to a yaml file.

Parameters:configuration (<Python object(s)>) – Configuration object.
Returns:True (success) | False.
